title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 142.4 - Appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 142.4 - Appeals

State Regulations

Pursuant to paragraph (b) of subdivision 5 of section
130
of the

Civil Service Law, an employee, employee representative, or appointing officer
aggrieved by a determination of the Director of Classification and Compensation
may appeal from such determination to the Civil Service Commission. Such appeal
must be made within 60 days after receipt of written notice of such
determination. Determinations of the Civil Service Commission shall be subject
to the same conditions, restrictions and limitations provided by law and the
implementing rules which govern determinations by the Director of

Classification and Compensation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
142.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
